display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI in NREM sleep (>= 2% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or NREM sleep time is 0
calculation: rdimnr2p  = 60*(hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2 + manrbp2 + manrop2)/(slpprdp - minremp)
